named-query.name: findQuestionOrderByUpdate
named-query.query: SELECT question FROM Question question ORDER BY question.editedTimeStamp

named-query.name: findQuestionOrderByVotes
named-query.query: SELECT question FROM Question question ORDER BY question.vote

named-query.name: findQuestionOrderByAnswerCount
named-query.query: SELECT question FROM Question question ORDER BY question.answerCount

named-query.name: findQuestionOrderByViewCount
named-query.query: SELECT question FROM Question question ORDER BY question.viewCount

named-query.name: rejectAllAnswers
named-query.query: UPDATE Answer answer set accepted = FALSE WHERE answer.question.id= :questionId

named-query.name: findPostViewByPostIdAndIpAddress
named-query.query: SELECT postView FROM PostView postView WHERE postView.ip= :ip AND postView.postId=:postId

named-query.name: findPostViewByPostIdAndUserId
named-query.query: SELECT postView FROM PostView postView WHERE postView.userId= :userId AND postView.postId=:postId
